body:
There were samples of output from different compilers in the docstrings of the various `default_version` methods. This PR:

- [x] Adds tests that use the output above to ensure that the correct version is detected for each compiler
- [x] Refactors the `default_version` method to make it more testable by dividing the part that produces the output from the one that tries to extract a version from it
title: Added tests on compiler's version detection
